- Exterior entry door (painted steel) â€“ interior-facing view; bottom threshold area shows staining.
- Green/yellow mold/mildew visible on lower panels; additional dark staining along bottom edge.
- Indicates moisture intrusion at the door bottom or threshold; weather seal may be compromised.
- Surface finish scuffed with mold staining; potential delamination of paint in affected areas.
- Recommend: inspect/repair door sweep and weatherstripping; clean mold with appropriate solution; repaint affected areas; investigate and address moisture source around the door frame.
